EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day - Vienna - 2014.09.17.Email - Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your registration is confirmed for Tricentis Partner Dinner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for your registration. Here are your confirmation details:
Tricentis Partner Dinner
Wednesday, Sept 17, 2014, 6 p.m. CET
Restaurant Palmenhaus Palmenhaus, Burggarten A-1010 Vienna
We are looking forward to seeing you there.
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
